title: Jeff Fenech fears for his life after being struck with pneumonia in Thailand
text:
Boxing champion Jeff Fenech said he fears for his life after he was struck down by pneumonia while at a boxing retreat in Thailand.

The 55-year-old said he was extremely concerned he will miss his daughter Jessica's wedding in Australia.

'Every night I have been here I think I'm not going to wake up tomorrow,' he told the Sunday Telegraph.

Jeff Fenech is in hospital in Thailand after being diagnosed with pneumonia. Pictured with wife Suzee at the Dally M awards in 2014

Fenech fears for his life as he said every night in hospital he is concerned he may not wake up. Pictured: Fenech in 1991 during fight against Azumah Nelson

He said he was sweating, shaking and could barely talk when he was admitted to hospital.

Fenech also has a lung infection, pain in his limbs and is coughing up blood.

His wife, Suzee, is waiting to be given the all clear to jump on a plane to Bangkok so she can take Fenech home to Australia.

Fenech has been in Thailand since last Tuesday with other boxers for a training camp but his health quickly deteriorated and he was taken to hospital.

'Then all of a sudden, the ambulance came. The lady said: "I can't tell you what would have happened if you didn't come to hospital". It wouldn't have been good news,' Fenech said.

He said he finds it impossible to sleep as he is in so much pain.

The 55-year-old said he was extremely concerned he will miss his daughter Jessica's (pictured centre) wedding in Australia

Fenech had begun complaining to his wife about the pain before he left - a sign she now said should have made him stay home.

However he didn't want to disappoint the boxers.

'He has been ringing me all night. He sounds like he is in so much pain. I have been with him for 24 years and never seen in this kind of situation. It's awful, really scary,' she said.

One of the fighters with Fenech - Brock Jarvis - called Mrs Fenech to tell her what had happened.

The team of boxers is set to return on Tuesday - but Mrs Fenech doesn't believe her husband will make that flight.

The family desperately want him home to attend Jessica's wedding.
description: Jeff Fenech, 55, was at a boxing training camp in Thailand when he was hospitalised with pneumonia. His wife, Suzee, said she is extremely worried about her husband.
authors: Claudia Poposki For Daily Mail Australia
